00078 #else
00079 #include <netdb.h>

00091 typedef int INT;
00092 
00093 #define MAX_ATTACHMENTS  10
00094 #define NAME_LENGTH     100
00095 #define MAX_N_ATTR       20
00096 
00097 int verbose;

00100 
00101 char *map = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
00102 
00103 void base64_encode(char *s, char *d)
00104 {
00105    unsigned int t, pad;
00106 
00107    pad = 3 - strlen(s) % 3;
00108    while (*s) {
00109       t = (*s++) << 16;
00110       if (*s)
00111          t |= (*s++) << 8;
00112       if (*s)
00113          t |= (*s++) << 0;
00114 
00115       *(d + 3) = map[t & 63];
00116       t >>= 6;
00117       *(d + 2) = map[t & 63];
00118       t >>= 6;
00119       *(d + 1) = map[t & 63];
00120       t >>= 6;
00121       *(d + 0) = map[t & 63];
00122 
00123       d += 4;
00124    }
00125    *d = 0;
00126    while (pad--)
00127       *(--d) = '=';
00128 }

00131 
00132 void sgets(char *string, int size)
00133 {
00134    char *p;
00135 
00136    do {
00137       p = fgets(string, size, stdin);
00138    } while (p == NULL);
00139 
00140    if (strlen(p) > 0 && p[strlen(p) - 1] == '\n')
00141       p[strlen(p) - 1] = 0;
00142 }

00145 
00146 char request[600000], response[10000], content[600000];
00147 
00148 INT submit_elog(char *host, int port, char *experiment, char *passwd,
00149                 char *uname, char *upwd,
00150                 char attrib_name[MAX_N_ATTR][NAME_LENGTH],
00151                 char attrib[MAX_N_ATTR][NAME_LENGTH],
00152                 int n_attr,
00153                 char *text,
00154                 char afilename[MAX_ATTACHMENTS][256],
00155                 char *buffer[MAX_ATTACHMENTS], INT buffer_size[MAX_ATTACHMENTS])
00156 /********************************************************************\
00157 
00158   Routine: submit_elog
00159 
00160   Purpose: Submit an ELog entry
00161 
00162   Input:
00163     char   *host            Host name where ELog server runs
00164     in     port             ELog server port number
00165     char   *passwd          Write password
00166     char   *uname           User name
00167     char   *upwd            User password
00168     int    run              Run number
00169     char   *attrib_name     Attribute names
00170     char   *attrib          Attribute values
00171     char   *text            Message text
00172 
00173     char   afilename[]      File names of attachments
00174     char   *buffer[]        Attachment contents
00175     INT    buffer_size[]    Size of buffer in bytes
00176 
00177   Function value:
00178     EL_SUCCESS              Successful completion
00179 
00180 \********************************************************************/
00181 {
00182    int status, sock, i, n, header_length, content_length;
00183    struct hostent *phe;
00184    struct sockaddr_in bind_addr;
00185    char host_name[256], boundary[80], str[80], *p;
00186 
00187 #if defined( _MSC_VER )
00188    {
00189       WSADATA WSAData;
00190 
00191       /* Start windows sockets */
00192       if (WSAStartup(MAKEWORD(1, 1), &WSAData) != 0)
00193          return -1;
00194    }
00195 #endif
00196 
00197    /* get local host name */
00198    gethostname(host_name, sizeof(host_name));
00199 
00200    phe = gethostbyname(host_name);
00201    if (phe == NULL) {
00202       perror("Cannot retrieve host name");
00203       return -1;
00204    }
00205    phe = gethostbyaddr(phe->h_addr, sizeof(int), AF_INET);
00206    if (phe == NULL) {
00207       perror("Cannot retrieve host name");
00208       return -1;
00209    }
00210 
00211    /* if domain name is not in host name, hope to get it from phe */
00212    if (strchr(host_name, '.') == NULL)
00213       strcpy(host_name, phe->h_name);
00214 
00215    /* create socket */
00216    if ((sock = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) == -1) {
00217       perror("cannot create socket");
00218       return -1;
00219    }
00220 
00221    /* compose remote address */
00222    memset(&bind_addr, 0, sizeof(bind_addr));
00223    bind_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00224    bind_addr.sin_addr.s_addr = 0;
00225    bind_addr.sin_port = htons((unsigned short) port);
00226 
00227    phe = gethostbyname(host);
00228    if (phe == NULL) {
00229       perror("cannot get host name");
00230       return -1;
00231    }
00232    memcpy((char *) &(bind_addr.sin_addr), phe->h_addr, phe->h_length);
00233 
00234    /* connect to server */
00235    status = connect(sock, (void *) &bind_addr, sizeof(bind_addr));
00236    if (status != 0) {
00237       printf("Cannot connect to host %s, port %d\n", host, port);
00238       return -1;
00239    }
00240 
00241    if (verbose)
00242       printf("Successfully connected to host %s, port %d\n", host, port);
00243 
00244    /* compose content */
00245    strcpy(boundary, "---------------------------7d0bf1a60904bc");
00246    strcpy(content, boundary);
00247    strcat(content, "\r\nContent-Disposition: form-data; name=\"cmd\"\r\n\r\nSubmit\r\n");
00248 
00249    if (uname[0])
00250       sprintf(content + strlen(content),
00251               "%s\r\nContent-Disposition: form-data; name=\"unm\"\r\n\r\n%s\r\n",
00252               boundary, uname);
00253 
00254    if (upwd[0]) {
00255       base64_encode(upwd, str);
00256       sprintf(content + strlen(content),
00257               "%s\r\nContent-Disposition: form-data; name=\"upwd\"\r\n\r\n%s\r\n",
00258               boundary, str);
00259    }
00260 
00261    if (experiment[0])
00262       sprintf(content + strlen(content),
00263               "%s\r\nContent-Disposition: form-data; name=\"exp\"\r\n\r\n%s\r\n",
00264               boundary, experiment);
00265 
00266    for (i = 0; i < n_attr; i++)
00267       sprintf(content + strlen(content),
00268               "%s\r\nContent-Disposition: form-data; name=\"%s\"\r\n\r\n%s\r\n", boundary,
00269               attrib_name[i], attrib[i]);
00270 
00271    sprintf(content + strlen(content),
00272            "%s\r\nContent-Disposition: form-data; name=\"Text\"\r\n\r\n%s\r\n%s\r\n",
00273            boundary, text, boundary);
00274 
00275    content_length = strlen(content);
00276    p = content + content_length;
00277 
00278    for (i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
00279       if (afilename[i][0]) {
00280          sprintf(p,
00281                  "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"attfile%d\"; filename=\"%s\"\r\n\r\n",
00282                  i + 1, afilename[i]);
00283 
00284          content_length += strlen(p);
00285          p += strlen(p);
00286          memcpy(p, buffer[i], buffer_size[i]);
00287          p += buffer_size[i];
00288          strcpy(p, boundary);
00289          strcat(p, "\r\n");
00290 
00291          content_length += buffer_size[i] + strlen(p);
00292          p += strlen(p);
00293       }
00294 
00295    /* compose request */
00296    sprintf(request, "POST /EL/ HTTP/1.0\r\n");
00297    sprintf(request + strlen(request),
00298            "Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=%s\r\n", boundary);
00299    sprintf(request + strlen(request), "Host: %s\r\n", host_name);
00300    sprintf(request + strlen(request), "User-Agent: ELOG\r\n");
00301    sprintf(request + strlen(request), "Content-Length: %d\r\n", content_length);
00302 
00303    if (passwd[0]) {
00304       base64_encode(passwd, str);
00305       sprintf(request + strlen(request), "Cookie: elog_wpwd=%s\r\n", str);
00306    }
00307 
00308    strcat(request, "\r\n");
00309 
00310    header_length = strlen(request);
00311    memcpy(request + header_length, content, content_length);
00312 
00313    /*
00314       {
00315       FILE *f;
00316       f = fopen("elog.log", "w");
00317       fwrite(request, header_length+content_length, 1, f);
00318       fclose(f);
00319       }
00320     */
00321 
00322    /* send request */
00323    if (verbose) {
00324       printf("Request sent to host:\n");
00325       puts(request);
00326    }
00327 
00328    send(sock, request, header_length + content_length, 0);
00329 
00330    /* receive response */
00331    i = recv(sock, response, 10000, 0);
00332    if (i < 0) {
00333       perror("Cannot receive response");
00334       return -1;
00335    }
00336 
00337    /* discard remainder of response */
00338    n = i;
00339    while (i > 0) {
00340       i = recv(sock, response + n, 10000, 0);
00341       if (i > 0)
00342          n += i;
00343    }
00344    response[n] = 0;
00345 
00346    closesocket(sock);
00347 
00348    if (verbose) {
00349       printf("Response received:\n");
00350       puts(response);
00351    }
00352 
00353    /* check response status */
00354    if (strstr(response, "302 Found"))
00355       printf("Message successfully transmitted\n");
00356    else if (strstr(response, "Logbook Selection"))
00357       printf("No logbook specified\n\n");
00358    else if (strstr(response, "Enter password"))
00359       printf("Missing or invalid password\n");
00360    else if (strstr(response, "login"))
00361       printf("Missing or invalid user name/password\n");
00362    else
00363       printf("Error transmitting message\n");
00364 
00365    return 1;
00366 }
00367 
00368 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00369 
00370 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00371 {
00372    char str[1000], text[10000], uname[80], upwd[80];
00373    char host_name[256], logbook[32], textfile[256], password[80];
00374    char *buffer[MAX_ATTACHMENTS], attachment[MAX_ATTACHMENTS][256];
00375    INT att_size[MAX_ATTACHMENTS];
00376    INT i, n, fh, n_att, n_attr, size, port;
00377    char attr_name[MAX_N_ATTR][NAME_LENGTH], attrib[MAX_N_ATTR][NAME_LENGTH];
00378 
00379    text[0] = textfile[0] = uname[0] = upwd[0] = 0;
00380    host_name[0] = logbook[0] = password[0] = n_att = n_attr = 0;
00381    port = 80;
00382    for (i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
00383       attachment[i][0] = 0;
00384       buffer[i] = NULL;
00385       att_size[i] = 0;
00386    }
00387 
00388    /* parse command line parameters */
00389    for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00390       if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'v')
00391          verbose = 1;
00392       else {
00393          if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
00394             if (i + 1 >= argc || argv[i + 1][0] == '-')
00395                goto usage;
00396             if (argv[i][1] == 'h')
00397                strcpy(host_name, argv[++i]);
00398             else if (argv[i][1] == 'p')
00399                port = atoi(argv[++i]);
00400             else if (argv[i][1] == 'l')
00401                strcpy(logbook, argv[++i]);
00402             else if (argv[i][1] == 'w')
00403                strcpy(password, argv[++i]);
00404             else if (argv[i][1] == 'u') {
00405                strcpy(uname, argv[++i]);
00406                strcpy(upwd, argv[++i]);
00407             } else if (argv[i][1] == 'a') {
00408                strcpy(str, argv[++i]);
00409                if (strchr(str, '=')) {
00410                   strcpy(attrib[n_attr], strchr(str, '=') + 1);
00411                   *strchr(str, '=') = 0;
00412                   strcpy(attr_name[n_attr], str);
00413                   n_attr++;
00414                } else {
00415                   printf
00416                       ("Error: Attributes must be supplied in the form \"-a <attribute>=<value>\".\n");
00417                   return 0;
00418                }
00419             } else if (argv[i][1] == 'f')
00420                strcpy(attachment[n_att++], argv[++i]);
00421             else if (argv[i][1] == 'm')
00422                strcpy(textfile, argv[++i]);
00423             else {
00424              usage:
00425                printf("\nusage: elog -h <hostname> [-p port]\n");
00426                printf("           [-l logbook/experiment]\n");
00427                printf("           [-v]                     for verbose output\n");
00428                printf
00429                    ("           [-w password]            write password defined on server\n");
00430                printf("           [-u username password]   user name and password\n");
00431                printf("           [-f <attachment>]        (up to %d times)\n",
00432                       MAX_ATTACHMENTS);
00433                printf("           -a <attribute>=<value>   (up to %d times)\n",
00434                       MAX_N_ATTR);
00435                printf("           -m <textfile>] | <text>\n");
00436                printf("\nArguments with blanks must be enclosed in quotes\n");
00437                printf("The elog message can either be submitted on the command line\n");
00438                printf
00439                    ("or in a file with the -m flag. Multiple attributes and attachments\n");
00440                printf("can be supplied\n");
00441                return 0;
00442             }
00443          } else
00444             strcpy(text, argv[i]);
00445       }
00446    }
00447 
00448    if (host_name[0] == 0 || n_attr == 0 || (text[0] == 0 && textfile[0] == 0))
00449       goto usage;
00450 
00451   /*---- open text file ----*/
00452 
00453    if (textfile[0]) {
00454       fh = open(textfile, O_RDONLY | O_BINARY);
00455       if (fh < 0) {
00456          printf("Message file \"%s\" does not exist.\n", textfile);
00457          return 0;
00458       }
00459 
00460       size = lseek(fh, 0, SEEK_END);
00461       lseek(fh, 0, SEEK_SET);
00462 
00463       if (size > sizeof(text) - 1) {
00464          printf("Message file \"%s\" is too long (%d bytes max).\n", textfile,
00465                 (int)sizeof(text));
00466          return 0;
00467       }
00468 
00469       memset(text, 0, sizeof(text));
00470       i = read(fh, text, size);
00471       if (i < size) {
00472          printf("Cannot fully read message file \"%s\".\n", textfile);
00473          return 0;
00474       }
00475 
00476       close(fh);
00477    }
00478 
00479   /*---- open attachment file ----*/
00480 
00481    for (i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
00482       if (!attachment[i][0])
00483          break;
00484 
00485       fh = open(attachment[i], O_RDONLY | O_BINARY);
00486       if (fh < 0) {
00487          printf("Attachment file \"%s\" does not exist.\n", attachment[i]);
00488          return 0;
00489       }
00490 
00491       att_size[i] = lseek(fh, 0, SEEK_END);
00492       lseek(fh, 0, SEEK_SET);
00493 
00494       buffer[i] = malloc(att_size[i] + 1);
00495       if (buffer[i] == NULL || att_size[i] > 500 * 1024) {
00496          printf("Attachment file \"%s\" is too long (500k max).\n", attachment[i]);
00497          return 0;
00498       }
00499 
00500       n = read(fh, buffer[i], att_size[i]);
00501       if (n < att_size[i]) {
00502          printf("Cannot fully read attachment file \"%s\".\n", attachment[i]);
00503          return 0;
00504       }
00505       buffer[i][n] = 0;
00506 
00507       close(fh);
00508    }
00509 
00510    /* now submit message */
00511    submit_elog(host_name, port, logbook, password,
00512                uname, upwd,
00513                attr_name, attrib, n_attr, text, attachment, buffer, att_size);
00514 
00515    for (i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++)
00516       if (buffer[i])
00517          free(buffer[i]);
00518 
00519    return 1;
00520 }
